sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-row>
      <v-col cols="3" class="film-column" v-for="film in films1" :key="film.id">
        <FilmPage :filmP="film"></FilmPage>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
    <v-row>
<!--      {{newFilms}}-->
      <v-col cols="3" class="film-column" v-for="film in newFilms" :key="film.id">
        <FilmPage :filmP="film"></FilmPage>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import FilmPage from "./FilmPage.vue";
import { FILMS } from "@/components/DATA/database";
import {apiService} from "@/common/api.service";

export default {
  name: "RepertoirePage",
  components: { FilmPage },
  data() {
    return {
      films1: FILMS,
        newFilms: [],
    };
  },
    methods: {
      getFilms() {
          let endpoint = "api/films/";
          apiService(endpoint)
          .then(data => {
              this.newFilms.push(...data);
          })
      }
    },
    created() {
      this.getFilms()
        console.log(this.newFilms)

    }
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.film-column {
  justify-content: center;
  text-align: center;
  flex-wrap: wrap !important;
}
</style>
